terminal.label: Family Security
terminal.desc: Ensuring the safety and well-being of one’s family.

terminal.label: National Security
terminal.desc: Safety and stability of one’s nation.

terminal.label: Global Citizenship
terminal.desc: Belonging and responsibility to the global community.

terminal.label: Social Justice
terminal.desc: A fair, equitable, and just society.

terminal.label: Mature Love
terminal.desc: Deep, committed relationship with intimacy and passion.

terminal.label: A World of Beauty
terminal.desc: Valuing beauty in nature, art, and life experiences.

terminal.label: Recognition
terminal.desc: Acknowledgment, respect, and esteem from others.

terminal.label: Freedom
terminal.desc: Autonomy and the right to make choices.

terminal.label: Authenticity
terminal.desc: Being true to oneself with sincerity.

terminal.label: Happiness
terminal.desc: Joy and a sense of purpose.

instrumental.label: Open-mindedness
instrumental.desc: Consider new ideas; revise views based on evidence.

instrumental.label: Humility
instrumental.desc: Be grounded; learn from others.

instrumental.label: Empathy
instrumental.desc: Resonate with others’ feelings and respond appropriately.

instrumental.label: Tolerance
instrumental.desc: Accept differences even when uncomfortable.

instrumental.label: Discipline
instrumental.desc: Act consistently with principles and rules.

instrumental.label: Logical Thinking
instrumental.desc: Systematic, rational reasoning.

instrumental.label: Helpfulness
instrumental.desc: Recognize needs and offer support.

instrumental.label: Responsiveness
instrumental.desc: Respond quickly and sensitively to needs.

instrumental.label: Imagination
instrumental.desc: Envision possibilities beyond current reality.

instrumental.label: Reliability
instrumental.desc: Keep promises; be consistent and dependable.

instrumental.label: Ambition
instrumental.desc: Hold big dreams and strive to realize them.

instrumental.label: Courage
instrumental.desc: Choose right action despite fear or difficulty.

instrumental.label: Competence
instrumental.desc: Perform tasks effectively and with quality.

instrumental.label: Perseverance
instrumental.desc: Endure hardship and don’t give up.

instrumental.label: Assertiveness
instrumental.desc: Express opinions and rights confidently.

instrumental.label: Self-control
instrumental.desc: Regulate impulses and emotions.

instrumental.label: Adaptability
instrumental.desc: Adjust flexibly to changing environments.

instrumental.label: Respect
instrumental.desc: Value others’ dignity and rights.

instrumental.label: Initiative
instrumental.desc: Take the lead and create opportunities.

instrumental.label: Intellectual Activity
instrumental.desc: Expand knowledge through learning and thinking.

instrumental.label: Integrity
instrumental.desc: Speak truth; align inner and outer self.

instrumental.label: Creativity
instrumental.desc: Generate original ideas and solutions.

instrumental.label: Cleanliness & Order
instrumental.desc: Keep spaces hygienic and organized.

instrumental.label: Loyalty
instrumental.desc: Maintain unwavering commitment and allegiance.

instrumental.label: Responsibility
instrumental.desc: Own outcomes; carry roles to completion.

instrumental.label: Kindness
instrumental.desc: Be warm and considerate to others.

instrumental.label: Cooperation
instrumental.desc: Work harmoniously with others toward goals.

instrumental.label: Resilience
instrumental.desc: Bounce back quickly from setbacks.

work.label: Fairness
work.desc: Equitable and just treatment at work.

work.label: Relationships
work.desc: Positive relationships with colleagues and supervisors.

work.label: Work–Life Balance
work.desc: Harmony between work and personal life.

work.label: Contribution (Impact)
work.desc: Make meaningful impact and add value.

work.label: Prestige
work.desc: Respect via reputable role or organization.

work.label: Advancement
work.desc: Opportunities for higher roles and responsibility.

work.label: Geographic Location
work.desc: Convenient location for commute and life.

work.label: Flexibility
work.desc: Flexible time or place of work.

work.label: Ethics
work.desc: Strong ethical standards in the environment.
